Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அரியகற்று ஆசற்றார் கண்ணும் தெரியுங்கால் இன்மை அரிதே வெளிறு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: When even men, who have studied the most difficult works, and who are free from faults, are (carefully) examined, it is a rare thing to find them without ignorance.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A seemingly perfect, wise scholar who is free from obvious faults ('ஆசற்றார்') and has studied rare texts ('அரியகற்று') is placed under a giant, magical magnifying glass representing deep scrutiny ('தெரியுங்கால்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Under the intense magnification, a single, tiny, almost invisible flaw or spot of ignorance ('வெளிறு') is revealed on their otherwise flawless character.
Layered_Composition.Background: A vast library stretches into the background, emphasizing the great extent of their learning, which makes the discovery of the tiny flaw all the more significant.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual statement on human fallibility: even the most learned and faultless individuals will likely reveal some small ignorance when examined closely.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The magical magnifying glass is the instrument of deep scrutiny. The single tiny flaw on a vast perfect surface is the key visual, representing that hidden bit of ignorance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, clinical light from the magnifying glass illuminates the subject, designed to find any imperfection. The flaw itself could have a subtle, different color to make it noticeable.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An extreme close-up shot through the magnifying glass, focusing on the tiny revealed flaw.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, macro photography style, with extreme detail.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Intense, focused lighting to create a sense of scrutiny.

Cultural_Anchors: The rarity of absolute perfection ('இன்மை அரிதே')

Negative_Prompt: scholar with huge flaws, no magnifying glass, text artifacts, blurry.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the appearance of the tiny flaw.
